about_the_game:
Dive into the icy chaos of The Seal Game – a rogue-lite, multiplayer survival game where you and your friends become adorable yet surprisingly agile seals fighting to stay alive in a brutal Arctic wilderness. But don’t let the cute exterior fool you: deadly predators like polar bears, orcas, and the unforgiving environment are ready to turn you into their next meal. Survival isn’t just about outrunning danger… sometimes, it’s about outsmarting your friends.

Gameplay Features:

  • Survival of the Seal-iest: Battle ferocious predators like polar bears and orcas while scavenging for resources to stay alive.

  • Multiplayer Madness: Team up with or betray your friends in chaotic multiplayer gameplay where strategy and humor collide.

  • Rogue-lite Progression: Every game is a fresh start, unique challenges to keep you on your toes.

  • Hilarious Physics: Throw snowballs, slip on ice, or witness bugs so funny they almost feel intentional (we’re looking at you, flying polar bear!).

  • Dark Comedy Tone: Laugh through the horror as your seal faces increasingly absurd (and bloody) scenarios.

  • Accidental Deforestation: Explore Arctic environments that sometimes come with quirks, like forests reduced to amusingly barren landscapes of stumps.

Why Wishlist?

  • Stay updated on the latest developments as we bring this unique mix of comedy and survival horror to life.

  • Be among the first to experience the chaos when The Seal Game launches on Steam.

The Arctic is calling. Will you survive the predators… or just survive your friends? Wishlist The Seal Game on Steam today and get ready to slip, slide, and strategize your way to survival!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
